title: Handyman David Bonola arrested in case of murdered Queens mother stabbed more than 55 times - WABC-TV
content:

description: Police said David Bonola and Orsolya Gaal had an off-and-on "intimate affair" for two years before he stabbed her to death and stuffed her body in a duffel bag.
